data.name: Inventory Space
data.description: Adds {value} to the maximum number of items in the inventory when equipped.

data.name: Haste
data.description: Adds {value} Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.

data.name: Initiative
data.description: Adds {value} Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Threat
data.description: Adds {value} Threat to its stats when equipped.
